p: B16 murine melanoma cells were obtained from the Riken Cell Bank (Tsukuba, Japan) and maintained as a monolayer culture in DMEM supplemented with 10% FBS, 4 mM l-glutamine, 50 units⁄mL penicillin, and 50 µg/mL streptomycin, and incubated at 37 °C in a humidified incubator with 5% CO 2. Photographs of the cells were taken using a Leica DFC290 HD camera (Beckman Coulter, CA, USA).
